category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_rename_catalog_comp_filename
preference.preference_description: Renames the filename of a document referenced in the catalog independently of other documents when an item is saved. Three characters represent an action to be carried out on the document to save. - 0 = no modification - 1 = modification The first character of the variable applies to the SAVE AS function. The second character of the variable applies to the SAVE EXISTING function. The third character of the variable applies to the SAVE NEW REVISION function. The default values are 000.
